title: IGN Tries to Get a Technical in NBA 2K13
description: Supposedly, screaming curse words at Kinect can trigger NBA 2K13 refs to charge your coach with a technical foul. The IGN editors are all too happy to test the theory.

transcript_chunks.text: Hey everybody it's Greg, Ryan is playing NBA 2K13. Apparently if you yell curse words when the ref is over there, the Kinect picks it up and we'll give you a technical foul, so we're going to do that all together here as soon as he, as soon he has the intentional foul look . He's doing, he's making posts happen. It's working. Shot, sh, it's shot. All right here we going to follow fty dirty. How did the Phoenix Suns so slow? **** **** he such a ****. Did it work? I didn't get a technical foul. NBA 2K13 better with Kinect.
